summary: A collection of PyQt5 widget classes that together build the graphical user interface of the SecureDrop client, covering status bars, conversation display, source management, authentication dialogs, file handling, export/print operations, and various interactive controls.
business_intent: Provide journalists with a secure, userâ€‘friendly desktop interface for communicating with sources, managing conversations and files, authenticating users, exporting and printing data, and performing actions such as replying or deleting, while delivering responsive visual feedback.
